info.description:
**⚠️ Beta: This app is currently in testing. Data loss is possible. Please backup your data regularly and report any issues.**
# Budget - Financial Tracking for Nextcloud
Track your spending habits, manage savings, and forecast future account balances with intelligent analysis of your financial history.
## Features
* **Import Bank Statements**: Support for CSV, OFX, and QIF formats * **Smart Categorization**: Automatic vendor matching and transaction categorization * **Auto-Categorization Rules**: Apply rules to existing transactions anytime with preview * **Split Transactions**: Allocate single transactions across multiple categories * **Transfer Detection**: Automatic matching of transfers between accounts * **Budget Tracking**: Set spending limits with alerts when approaching or exceeding budgets * **Balance Forecasting**: Predict future balances based on historical data * **Recurring Bills**: Track bills with due date monitoring and Nextcloud notifications * **Recurring Income**: Track expected income sources with receipt tracking * **Split Expenses**: Share expenses with contacts and track who owes whom * **Debt Payoff Planner**: Plan repayment using avalanche or snowball strategies * **Savings Goals**: Set targets with progress tracking and achievement forecasting * **Pension Tracker**: Track retirement accounts with growth projections * **Net Worth History**: Track assets and liabilities over time * **Year-over-Year Reports**: Compare spending across multiple years * **Multi-Account Support**: Manage multiple bank accounts and currencies * **Custom Categories**: Create your own category hierarchy * **Reports & Charts**: Visualize your financial data with interactive charts
## Requirements
* Nextcloud 30 or higher * PHP 8.1 or higher
